title: Aural set, sonata - opening scale degrees

content.description: You will hear a passage from a sonata. The excerpt, which consists of two main sections, will be played three times. Before listening to the excerpt for the first time, please read the questions.
content.question: The first two pitches of the opening theme, in scale-degree numbers, are

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Use symbols and terms to describe melodic, harmonic, and rhythmic relationships in performed music. (This skill is applied in describing these elements in a full musical context.)
